summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 41st Avenue Southwest, from West Graham Street to a point approximately 396 feet south of the south line of Gatewood Gardens Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9565 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
